About.title: To the Children and Youth of Turkey!
About.description: The Great Leader Gazi Mustafa Kemal Atatürk led the Turkish nation's struggle for independence and became the founder of the Republic of Turkey.
About.description2: The aim of this project is to chronologically narrate Atatürk's life, filled with courage, vision, and self-sacrifice, and to inspire young people.
About.usage2: The aim of this project is to chronologically narrate Atatürk's life, filled with courage, vision, and self-sacrifice, and to inspire young people.
